verses.verse: And the second <WH8145> lot <WH1486> came forth <WH3318> to Simeon <WH8095>, even for the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095> according to their families <WH4940>: and their inheritance <WH5159> was inside <WH8432> the inheritance <WH5159> of the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063>.
And they had in their inheritance <WH5159> Beer <WH884>–sheba, or Sheba <WH7652>, and Moladah <WH4137>,
And Hazar <WH2705>–shual, and Balah <WH1088>, and Azem <WH6107>,
And Eltolad <WH513>, and Bethul <WH1329>, and Hormah <WH2767>,
And Ziklag <WH6860>, and Beth <WH1024>–marcaboth, and Hazar <WH2701>–susah,
And Beth <WH1034>–lebaoth, and Sharuhen <WH8287>; thirteen <WH7969> cities <WH5892> and their villages <WH2691>:
Ain <WH5871>, Remmon <WH7417>, and Ether <WH6281>, and Ashan <WH6228>; four <WH702> cities <WH5892> and their villages <WH2691>:

And all the villages <WH2691> that were round about <WH5439> these cities <WH5892> to Baalath <WH1192>–beer, Ramath <WH7414> of the south <WH5045>. This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095> according to their families <WH4940>.

Out of the portion <WH2256> of the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> was the inheritance <WH5159> of the sons <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095>: for the part <WH2506> of the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> was too much <WH7227> for them <WH1121>: therefore the sons of Simeon <WH8095> had their inheritance <WH5157> inside <WH8432> the inheritance of them <WH5159>.

And the third <WH7992> lot <WH1486> came up <WH5927> for the sons <WH1121> of Zebulun <WH2074> according to their families <WH4940>: and the border <WH1366> of their inheritance <WH5159> was unto Sarid <WH8301>:

And their border <WH1366> went up <WH5927> toward the sea <WH3220>, and Maralah <WH4831>, and reached <WH6293> to Dabbasheth <WH1708>, and reached <WH6293> to the river <WH5158> that is before <WH6440> Jokneam <WH3362>;

And turned <WH7725> from Sarid <WH8301> eastward <WH6924> toward the sunrising <WH4217> unto the border <WH1366> of Chisloth <WH3696>–tabor, and then goes out <WH3318> to Daberath <WH1705>, and goes up <WH5927> to Japhia <WH3309>,
And from there passes on along <WH5674> on the east <WH4217> to Gittah <WH1662>–hepher, to Ittah <WH6278>–kazin, and goes out <WH3318> to Remmon <WH7417>–methoar to Neah <WH5269>;
And the border <WH1366> turned around <WH5437> it on the north side <WH6828> to Hannathon <WH2615>: and the outgoings <WH8444> there are in the valley <WH1516> of Jiphthah <WH3317>–el:
And Kattath <WH7005>, and Nahallal <WH5096>, and Shimron <WH8110>, and Idalah <WH3030>, and Beth <WH1035>–lehem: twelve <WH8147> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the sons <WH1121> of Zebulun <WH2074> according to their families <WH4940>, these cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
And the fourth <WH7243> lot <WH1486> came out <WH3318> to Issachar <WH3485>, for the sons <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485> according to their families <WH4940>.
And their border <WH1366> was toward Jezreel <WH3157>, and Chesulloth <WH3694>, and Shunem <WH7766>,
And Hapharaim <WH2663>, and Shion <WH7866>, and Anaharath <WH588>,
And Rabbith <WH7245>, and Kishion <WH7191>, and Abez <WH77>,
And Remeth <WH7432>, and En <WH5873>–gannim, and En <WH5876>–haddah, and Beth <WH1048>–pazzez;

And the coast <WH1366> reaches <WH6293> to Tabor <WH8396>, and Shahazimah <WH7831>, and Beth <WH1053>–shemesh; and the outgoings <WH8444> of their border <WH1366> were at Jordan <WH3383>: sixteen <WH8337> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485> according to their families <WH4940>, the cities <WH5892> and their villages <WH2691>.
And the fifth <WH2549> lot <WH1486> came out <WH3318> for the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> according to their families <WH4940>.
And their border <WH1366> was Helkath <WH2520>, and Hali <WH2482>, and Beten <WH991>, and Achshaph <WH407>,
And Alammelech <WH487>, and Amad <WH6008>, and Misheal <WH4861>; and reaches <WH6293> to Carmel <WH3760> westward <WH3220>, and to Shihor <WH7884>–libnath;

And turns <WH7725> toward the sunrising <WH4217> to Beth <WH1016>–dagon, and reaches <WH6293> to Zebulun <WH2074>, and to the valley <WH1516> of Jiphthah <WH3317>–el toward the north side <WH6828> of Beth <WH1025>–emek, and Neiel <WH5272>, and goes out <WH3318> to Cabul <WH3521> on the left hand <WH8040>,
And Hebron <WH5683>, and Rehob <WH7340>, and Hammon <WH2540>, and Kanah <WH7071>, even unto great <WH7227> Zidon <WH6721>;

And then the coast <WH1366> turns <WH7725> to Ramah <WH7414>, and to the strong <WH4013> city <WH5892> Tyre <WH6865>; and the coast <WH1366> turns <WH7725> to Hosah <WH2621>; and the outgoings <WH8444> there are at the sea <WH3220> from the coast <WH2256> to Achzib <WH392>:
Ummah <WH5981> also <WH663>, and Aphek, and Rehob <WH7340>: twenty <WH6242> and two <WH8147> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> according to their families <WH4940>, these cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
The sixth <WH8345> lot <WH1486> came out <WH3318> to the sons <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321>, even for the sons <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321> according to their families <WH4940>.

And their coast <WH1366> was from Heleph <WH2501>, from Allon <WH438> to Zaanannim <WH6815>, and Adami <WH129>, Nekeb <WH5346>, and Jabneel <WH2995>, unto Lakum <WH3946>; and the outgoings <WH8444> there were at Jordan <WH3383>:

And then the coast <WH1366> turns <WH7725> westward <WH3220> to Aznoth <WH243>–tabor, and goes out <WH3318> from there to Hukkok <WH2712>, and reaches <WH6293> to Zebulun <WH2074> on the south side <WH5045>, and reaches <WH6293> to Asher <WH836> on the west side <WH3220>, and to Judah <WH3063> upon Jordan <WH3383> toward the sunrising <WH4217>.
And the fenced <WH4013> cities <WH5892> are Ziddim <WH6661>, Zer <WH6863>, and Hammath <WH2575>, Rakkath <WH7557>, and Chinnereth <WH3672>,
And Adamah <WH128>, and Ramah <WH7414>, and Hazor <WH2674>,
And Kedesh <WH6943>, and Edrei <WH154>, and En <WH5877>–hazor,
And Iron <WH3375>, and Migdal <WH4027>–el, Horem <WH2765>, and Beth <WH1043>–anath, and Beth <WH1053>–shemesh; nineteen <WH8672> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321> according to their families <WH4940>, the cities <WH5892> and their villages <WH2691>.
And the seventh <WH7637> lot <WH1486> came out <WH3318> for the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> according to their families <WH4940>.
And the coast <WH1366> of their inheritance <WH5159> was Zorah <WH6881>, and Eshtaol <WH847>, and Ir <WH5905>–shemesh,
And Shaalabbin <WH8169>, and Ajalon <WH357>, and Jethlah <WH3494>,
And Elon <WH356>, and Thimnathah <WH8553>, and Ekron <WH6138>,
And Eltekeh <WH514>, and Gibbethon <WH1405>, and Baalath <WH1191>,
And Jehud <WH3055>, and Bene <WH1139>–berak, and Gath <WH1667>–rimmon,
And Me <WH4313>–jarkon, and Rakkon <WH7542>, with the border <WH1366> before <WH4136> Japho <WH3305>.

And the coast <WH1366> of the sons <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> went out <WH3318> too little for them <WH1121>: therefore the sons of Dan <WH1835> went up <WH5927> to fight <WH3898> against Leshem <WH3959>, and took <WH3920> it <WH5221>, and struck it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and possessed <WH3423> it <WH3427>, and lived in it <WH7121>, and called Leshem <WH3959>, Dan <WH1835>, after the name <WH8034> of Dan <WH1835> their father <WH1>.
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> according to their families <WH4940>, these cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.

When they had made an end <WH3615> of dividing the land <WH776> for inheritance <WH5157> by their coasts <WH1367>, the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> gave <WH5414> an inheritance <WH5159> to Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> among them <WH8432>:

According to the word <WH6310> of the Lord <WH3068> they gave <WH5414> him the city <WH5892> which he asked <WH7592>, even Timnath <WH8556>–serah in mountain <WH2022> Ephraim <WH669>: and he built <WH1129> the city <WH5892>, and lived in it <WH3427>.

These are the inheritances <WH5159>, which Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548>, and Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, and the heads <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1> of the tribes <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, divided for an inheritance <WH5157> by lot <WH1486> in Shiloh <WH7887> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>, at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>. So they made an end <WH3615> of dividing <WH2505> the country <WH776>.
